text: The Star is a movie from 1952. It was directed by Stuart Heisler. It stars Bette Davis, Sterling Hayden and Natalie Wood. Davis got a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actress for this movie. Category:1952 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Stuart Heisler Category:1950s English-language movies
title: The Star (1952 movie)
